entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 6.
